body: Added - How did Lal Bahadur Shastri became Prime Minister? ------------ Taking office. After the death of Nehru, several leaders of the ruling Indian National Congress nominated Shastri due to his socialist background, to stand against the conservative Morarji Desai. ... Shastri was sworn in on 9 June 1964 taking over from the Acting Prime Minister Gulzarilal Nanda.
